img_summary: The image depicts a mystical potion bottle, likely representing the "Life-Saving Pill" from the game "Black Myth: Wukong." This item is classified as Epic and is used to instantly recover full health and remove all four Banes states. The formula for crafting this pill can be found in Cloudnest Peak in Purple Cloud Mountain, specifically in The Webbed Hollow, in a house near the Shrine, or purchased from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge. The ingredients required for the Life-Saving Pill include 1 Fire Bellflower and 1 Golden Lotus.
